welcome_message_body: Welcome to Union, where small-town charm meets rich history and natural beauty. Take a stroll through our historic downtown, explore our scenic parks, and immerse yourself in the friendly and welcoming atmosphere of our city. Enjoy your time in Union!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: FBO Terminal
terminals.description: The FBO terminal at Teterboro Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines and its regional affiliates.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights operated by various airlines, including American Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines, including United Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
